name: Fédération Européenne des Cadres de l'Energie et de la Recherche - European Federation of managers and executives in the Energy sector
membership: FECER (http://www.fecer.eu) belongs to the CEC, one of the six cross-industry european social partner (http://cec-managers.eu). Through its national members organisations and professional federations, it represents 1,5 million managers in Europe. This Confederation is affiliated to the CIC (International Managers Confederation)
goal:
- Taking part and making ear the managers voice in the European,social dialogue, related to the energy and research sectors.

- Participating to the european debates relevant to the Energy & Research sectors

- Supporting the building of a social Europe toward its experience and skills

- Negociating EWC agreement in supra-national companies
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- TTIP / CETA
- Plan Juncker
- Union Energy policy
- Clean Energy package
- Consultation on the mid-term evaluation of the Nuclear Decommissioning Assistance Programm (2017)
-...
